title: Google\Cloud\Functions\V1\SourceRepository
name: SourceRepository
description:
Describes SourceRepository, used to represent parameters related to source repository where a function is hosted.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.functions.v1.SourceRepository

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.url
params.description: The URL pointing to the hosted repository where the function is defined. There are supported Cloud Source Repository URLs in the following formats: To refer to a specific commit: https://source.developers.google.com/projects/*/repos/*/revisions/*/paths/* To refer to a moveable alias (branch): https://source.developers.google.com/projects/*/repos/*/moveable-aliases/*/paths/* In particular, to refer to HEAD use master moveable alias. To refer to a specific fixed alias (tag): https://source.developers.google.com/projects/*/repos/*/fixed-aliases/*/paths/* You may omit paths/* if you want to use the main directory.

params.name: data.deployed_url
params.description: Output only. The URL pointing to the hosted repository where the function were defined at the time of deployment. It always points to a specific commit in the format described above.

methods.name: getUrl
methods.description:

To refer to a specific fixed alias (tag): https://source.developers.google.com/projects/*/repos/*/fixed-aliases/*/paths/* You may omit paths/* if you want to use the main directory.
